title: No scrutiny fee shall be levied if the proposal is received after compliance of the objections raised by the authority
clause_text: No scrutiny fee shall be levied if the proposal is received after compliance of the objections raised by the authority. In case of revised permission, the scrutiny fee shall be applicable.

source_pdf.filename: UDCPR Updated 30.01.25 with earlier provisions & corrections_compressed.docx
source_pdf.text_snippet: No scrutiny fee shall be levied if the proposal is received after compliance of the objections raised by the authority.
